message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its potential, I'm offering it at $950,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $750,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but my offer reflects the true value of this product. I'm willing to come down slightly to $900,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer $825,000 for the product.
